argumentText:
ARGUMENT
k m

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gxid.1 | |- U = ( GId ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gxid.2 | |- P = ( ^g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( m = 0 -> ( U P m ) = ( U P 0 ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( m = 0 -> ( ( U P m ) = U <-> ( U P 0 ) = U ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( m = k -> ( U P m ) = ( U P k ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( m = k -> ( ( U P m ) = U <-> ( U P k ) = U ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( m = ( k + 1 ) -> ( U P m ) = ( U P ( k + 1 ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( m = ( k + 1 ) -> ( ( U P m ) = U <-> ( U P ( k + 1 ) ) = U ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( m = -u k -> ( U P m ) = ( U P -u k ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( m = -u k -> ( ( U P m ) = U <-> ( U P -u k ) = U ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( m = K -> ( U P m ) = ( U P K ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( m = K -> ( ( U P m ) = U <-> ( U P K ) = U ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ran G = ran G |
| 14 | 13, 1 | #P_grpoidcl | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> U e. ran G ) |
| 15 | 13, 1, 2 | #P_gx0 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ U e. ran G ) -> ( U P 0 ) = U ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_mpdan | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( U P 0 ) = U ) |
| 17 |  | #P_nn0z | |- ( k e. NN0 -> k e. ZZ ) |
| 18 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ ) -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 19 | 14 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ ) -> U e. ran G ) |
| 20 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ ) -> k e. ZZ ) |
| 21 | 13, 2 | #P_gxsuc | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ U e. ran G /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( U P ( k + 1 ) ) = ( ( U P k ) G U ) ) |
| 22 | 18, 19, 20, 21 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( U P ( k + 1 ) ) = ( ( U P k ) G U ) ) |
| 23 | 13, 2 | #P_gxcl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ U e. ran G /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( U P k ) e. ran G ) |
| 24 | 18, 19, 20, 23 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( U P k ) e. ran G ) |
| 25 | 13, 1 | #P_grporid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( U P k ) e. ran G ) -> ( ( U P k ) G U ) = ( U P k ) ) |
| 26 | 24, 25 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( ( U P k ) G U ) = ( U P k ) ) |
| 27 | 22, 26 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( U P k ) = ( U P ( k + 1 ) ) ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( ( U P k ) = U <-> ( U P ( k + 1 ) ) = U ) ) |
| 29 | 28 | #P_biimpd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( ( U P k ) = U -> ( U P ( k + 1 ) ) = U ) ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_ex | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( k e. ZZ -> ( ( U P k ) = U -> ( U P ( k + 1 ) ) = U ) ) ) |
| 31 | 17, 30 | #P_syl5 | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( k e. NN0 -> ( ( U P k ) = U -> ( U P ( k + 1 ) ) = U ) ) ) |
| 32 |  | #P_nnz | |- ( k e. NN -> k e. ZZ ) |
| 33 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( inv ` G ) = ( inv ` G ) |
| 34 | 13, 33, 2 | #P_gxneg | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ U e. ran G /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( U P -u k ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( U P k ) ) ) |
| 35 | 14, 34 | #P_syl3an2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( U P -u k ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( U P k ) ) ) |
| 36 | 35 | #P_3anidm12 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ ) -> ( U P -u k ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( U P k ) ) ) |
| 37 | 36 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ /\ ( U P k ) = U ) -> ( U P -u k ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( U P k ) ) ) |
| 38 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( ( U P k ) = U -> ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( U P k ) ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` U ) ) |
| 39 | 1, 33 | #P_grpoinvid | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( ( inv ` G ) ` U ) = U ) |
| 40 | 38, 39 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( U P k ) = U ) -> ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( U P k ) ) = U ) |
| 41 | 40 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ /\ ( U P k ) = U ) -> ( ( inv ` G ) ` ( U P k ) ) = U ) |
| 42 | 37, 41 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ k e. ZZ /\ ( U P k ) = U ) -> ( U P -u k ) = U ) |
| 43 | 42 | #P_3exp | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( k e. ZZ -> ( ( U P k ) = U -> ( U P -u k ) = U ) ) ) |
| 44 | 32, 43 | #P_syl5 | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( k e. NN -> ( ( U P k ) = U -> ( U P -u k ) = U ) ) ) |
| 45 | 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 16, 31, 44 | #P_zindd | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( K e. ZZ -> ( U P K ) = U ) ) |
| 46 | 45 | #P_imp | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( U P K ) = U ) |
